snippet.title: Hotel Barcelona - Official Gameplay Trailer | ID@Xbox
snippet.description:
Journey into the surreal world of Hotel Barcelona in this new trailer for the upcoming mystery horror action game co-developed by Suda51 and Swery65. The new Hotel Barcelona trailer showcases gameplay and more. Justine is a novice federal marshal who has an insane serial killer named Dr. Carnival living inside of her. Will she be able to exterminate all the evil serial killers and escape from this cursed hotel?! 

Hotel Barcelona will be available on PC via Steam, Xbox Series X|S, and PS5 in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
